game.title: Ancient Forgotten Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient relic hidden within the forgotten temple.
game.description: Legends speak of an ancient temple lost to time. Locals claim it houses a relic with unimaginable powers. Find the temple and retrieve the relic.
game.reward: The ancient relic, experience, and reputation.

task.description: Venture into the heart of the forest to find the long-lost Forgotten Temple.

task.objective: Solve the temple's riddles and puzzles.
task.description: Navigate through the temple's intricate challenges and ancient traps.
Face the temple's powerful guardian to claim the relic.
Obtain the ancient relic from its resting place in the temple.
Report your success to the Elder Bard.
